title: - Specialist for plastic, aesthetic and reconstructive surgery.
philosophy: Plastic surgery is like medicine meets art. And like an artist, I take immense pleasure both from the process and the result. Yet, as a medical professional, the purely artistic aspect alone is not adequate. Instead, my philosophy is to preserve the perfect harmony between beauty and well-being to create a long-lasting balance between health and beauty to provide my clients a way to reach their true selves.
